thread.title: Travelport signs multi-year deal with Travelgenio
thread.title_full: Travelport signs multi-year deal with Travelgenio

title: Travelport signs multi-year deal with Travelgenio
text:
0 comments Rob Gill Wed, 2 Sep 2015 10:57 Follow @BBT_online Travelport has announced a multi-year agreement with online travel agency Travelgenio.
Spanish firm Travelgenio, which specialises in travel within Europe and Latin America, will have access to Travelport’s Travel Commerce platform.
This offers travel content including branded fares and ancillaries from legacy carriers, low cost airlines and more than 650,000 hotel properties globally.
Mariano Pelizzari, CEO at Travelgenio, said: “We welcome our new relationship with Travelport because its unrivalled content and innovative products fit as part of our goal to provide extensive choice and value to our customers.”
Simon Ferguson, Travelport’s UK MD, Ireland and the Nordics, said: “We are pleased to have signed this new agreement with Travelgenio and look forward to helping drive growth for its business. Travelgenio is a leading online travel agency in Europe and therefore this new deal reinforces Travelport’s vision to redefine travel commerce.”
